description: Theta series of quadratic form with Gram matrix [ 2, 1, 0; 1, 4, 1; 0, 1, 4 ].
comments: This is the monoclinic P lattice (the even holotype) of dimension 3.
links: John Cannon, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
G. Nebe and N. J. A. Sloane, Home page for this lattice
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
